wikipedia_page.main: Mary Jane Evans (3 February 1888 – 25 February 1922) was a Welsh teacher, preacher and actress, best known for her solo recitations and dramatic monologues.

response: *25 February – Mary Jane Evans, teacher, preacher and actress, 34
*Mary Jane Evans, Welsh teacher, preacher and actress

From 1886-8 he studied at Bala Independent College, before becoming minister of Bwlchgwyn and Llandegla (1888–91), and then Pant Teg, Ystalyfera (1891-1926). One of his congregation at Ystalyfera was Mary Jane Evans, of whom he later edited a memoir.
